channel.title: Dragon defender
channel.description: IM being ghetto and using a dragon dagger as a dragon defender. I put in the shield slot but when you see the character its in his right hand. how would i put it in the left?

item.title: Dragon defender
item.dc:creator: @DaGamerChild DaGamerChild
item.description:
@DaGamerChild wrote:

Just add the real thing. If you do that, you’re going to have to change the stats also or else you’re going to be giving your players a strong bonus on top of their normal weapon. To add it, simply follow this link: http://lmgtfy.com/?q=how+to+add+dragon+defender+pi

Read full topic
